replies.body:
@Pos: mr. admin man hello well
i was much better giving a profound analysis on what i thought about everyone
and i also believe i've lost my spark on that ambit
nonetheless, we haven't exactly interacted much due to timezone issues i believe, but whenever i pulled all nighters you were the one i'd encounter pretty often
being a senior moderator alongside you was a pretty fun ride and i honestly looked up to you in that position
a very diligent staff member, radical friend and overall a funny guy who knows when to be serious and when not to be

replies.body:
Will you ever come back as staff? 

Why is your name grey for me on the forums ?????????????
replies.body_tagged:
Will you ever come back as staff? 

Why is your name grey for me on the forums ?????????????

replies.body:
@Cammy
well we frankly didn't interact much but it's apparent that you are a really cool dude i wish i had conversed more with, nonetheless i wanna get married asap and sire children post-haste
he's like one of my greatest friends in the whole server, i remember becoming junior moderators at the same time and i'll probably never regret letting him in the map dev team
look at him now, he's making me proud bc he's the best but also the worst and a flat geek
it's a tie between elsa and jozz tbh

@Remmy
me too tbh 

@Dawson
it's good, always on the look for new experiences
great, grades are peaking and i'm kinda happy about that
yes

@iScaglia
i haven't seen you use ":v" once in my life so i love you and i want to bear your children
17, turning 18 in october

@Xuph
hey eric! 

@Shoes
ahh i remember we did get to talk from time to time and i honestly enjoyed our conversations a lot, you're a really good person of amiable nature, as well as a great staff member from my reckoning
oh well i've been devoting my time to final fantasy record keeper on my phone, as well as skullgirls, don't starve, garry's mod, team fortress 2, terraria and pokemon showdown

@Anthony
hotter than the devil living on the sun lmfao
my dear salty friend you're one of my best pals on the network and i don't recall us ever getting in any beef despite both our short temper and the sodium carbonate that flows through our veins (although mine remained forcefully concealed during the better part of my journey as a staff member), i think you're amazing and i still love your skype picture

@Jackson
your current self is less of a noob 
but of course, bro
REEEEEE
i dunno, really, i don't feel like we're that close to an extent where i can easily pinpoint what are your best and worst attributes as a person
probably if i ever have time haha

@Yuno
beaner
i'm indifferent since i stopped caring about pvp a long time ago, not to mention i don't exactly mind minecraft as a whole anymore, i've moved on from it, but if anything i guess i have no major issues with what concerns pvp, what bugs me is that as minecraft keeps updating, the lag increases and my computer can't handle it anymore

@Piinoy
it's a possibility

@Raging
i don't think so, as i said i've moved on from avicus and minecraft altogether but if i ever decide to come back for whatever reason, it'd probably be as a map developer only
because i'm the best

replies.body:
PLAY IT. It's the best game I've played in ages, no words can describe how good the game is altogether. The music, art, story, plot and character development is beyond compare. 

I thought you'd mention my occasional impatience tbh xd

What is your favourite pastime? I could teach you some pixel art stuff w/ paint.net (no, it's not a website, it's a program) as well if ur interested, it's pretty fun once you get into it. Here's the link to the program, it's free.
